title.rendered: Aqualis ASA : Release date for Q3 2014 report

content.rendered:
Oslo, 28 August 2014

Aqualis ASA (OSE: AQUA), announces that the third quarter 2014 results will be released on 29 October 2014.

*****

Contact:

Christian Opsahl
CFO
+47 901 101 53
christian.opsahl@aqualisbraemar.com

This information is subject of the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5-12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.
